Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.
